title: Residence插件OP怎么删除玩家的领地
author: csl781
txt_content: Residence插件OP怎么删除玩家的领地      有个别玩家把别人的东西圈了  求教

replies.author: mailegebiao
replies.txt_content:
/res remove 删不掉
你可以试试/resadmin remove

replies.author: milu__
replies.txt_content:
/resadmin remove 领地ID
还有/resadmin pset 领地ID 玩家ID trusted 可以强制给某玩家领地全部权限

replies.author: Kelcoin
replies.txt_content:
输入/resadmin remove [领地名]
或者在保存领地的文件中找到这个领地然后删除

replies.author: 神の手
replies.txt_content:
听我的
先/res remove 领地名称
然后再/resadmin confirm
